dcterms:creator: J. Lengler
S. Riedi
dcterms:description: Dynamic BinVal is a fitness function where the order of bits is randomly permuted in each generation, affecting the optimization process of evolutionary algorithms.
dcterms:title: Dynamic BinVal

dcterms:creator: J. Lengler
J. Meier
dcterms:description: DynBV is a limiting case of dynamic binary value functions where a uniformly random permutation of bits is drawn for each generation, evaluating the BinVal function.
dcterms:title: DynBV

dcterms:creator: J. Lengler
U. Schaller
dcterms:description: Dynamic Linear Functions are a class of fitness functions characterized by randomly drawn positive weights for each generation, affecting the optimization process.
dcterms:title: Dynamic Linear Functions

dcterms:creator: J. Lengler
X. Zou
dcterms:description: HotTopic Functions are a class of monotone functions where the optimization behavior is studied under dynamic conditions, particularly focusing on population dynamics.
dcterms:title: HotTopic Functions
